tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (FRAG (CC And) (SBAR (RB even) (IN though) (S (NP (PRP they)) (VP (VP (VBD got) (NP (JJ good) (NNS reviews))) (CC and) (VP (VBP are) (RB about) (NP (JJ important) (NNS things)))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [got/VBD cc>And/CC advmod>even/RB mark>though/IN nsubj>they/PRP dobj>[reviews/NNS amod>good/JJ] cc>and/CC conj:and>[things/NNS cop>are/VBP advmod>about/RB amod>important/JJ] punct>./.]
